name: MapleStory Equipment Enhancement Pack
detailed_description:
Get everything you need to enhance your equipment in MapleStory with the Min - Max Master enhancement package. This package comes with cubes, scrolls, and potential stamps, all for a low, low price!



  • Red Cube (x3) (90-day duration)
    Get your hands on three beautifully crafted Red Cubes! Use a Red Cube to randomly reconfigure the Potential on a piece of your equipment that is ranked from Rare to Legendary. Make sure to use this item soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Black Cube (x3) (90-day duration)
    You also receive three elegant Black Cubes! Use a Black Cube to randomly reconfigure the Potential on a piece of your equipment that is ranked from Rare to Legendary. The Black Cube offers you the chance to decide whether or not to apply the new Potential to your item, and has a higher chance to raise your Potential rank than Red Cubes do. Make sure to use this item soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Bonus Potential Cube (x3) (90-day duration)
    Bonus Potential Cubes are powerful cubes that reconfigure the Bonus Potential on a piece of your equipment that is ranked from Rare to Legendary. It does not affect existing regular Potentials. Make sure to use this item soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Perfect Potential Stamp (90-day duration)
    Use this stamp on a piece of equipment with less than 3 Potential lines on it, and you will be able to add 1 additional line of Potential! Make sure to use this item soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Perfect Bonus Potential Stamp (90-day duration)
    Use this stamp on a piece of equipment with 1 or 2 existing Bonus Potential lines on it, and you will be able to add 1 additional line of Bonus Potential! Make sure to use this item soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Special Potential Scroll (90-day duration)
    Use this special scroll on a piece of equipment to add 3 lines of Potential without deducting from the available upgrade count. Make sure to use this item soon, as it will expire in 90 days.

  • Special Bonus Potential Scroll (90-day duration)
    Use this special scroll on a piece of equipment that has Potential lines, but no Bonus Potential lines. You will be able to add 3 lines of Bonus Potential to the item without deducting from the available upgrade count.

  • Unique Potential Scroll 30% Coupon (30-day duration)
    Use this coupon to receive a Unique Potential Scroll 30% with a 14-day duration. You can use the Unique Potential Scroll 30% to add Unique Potential to items that are ranked Epic or below.

Content is only redeemable in non-Reboot worlds.

short_description: Get everything you need to enhance your equipment in MapleStory with the Min - Max Master enhancement package. This package comes with cubes, scrolls, and potential stamps, all for a low, low price!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 or later
  • Processor:Intel Core Duo 2.4Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.4Ghz
  • Memory:2GB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 8600 GH / ATI Radeon HD 3450
  • Hard Drive:At least 14GB of free space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • We recommend that you install DirectX version 9.0 or higher for the client to run smoothly
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 or later
  • Processor:Intel Core Duo 3.0Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 3.0Ghz
  • Memory:at least 4GB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 9600 / ATI Radeon HD 3870 or higher
  • Hard Drive:At least 14GB of free space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0 or higher compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • We recommend that you install DirectX version 9.0 or higher for the client to run smoothly
